entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
